Invocation for someone you have spoken i.ARABIC_TEXT: قَالَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم: ((اللَّهُمَّ فَأَيُّمَا مُؤْمِنٍ سَبَبْتُهُ فَاجْعَلْ ذَلِكَ لَهُ قُرْبَةً إِلَيْكَ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ)).
Invocation for someone you have spoken i.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahumma fa-ayyuma mu/minin sababtuhu fajAAal thalika lahu qurbatan ilayka yawmal-qiyamah.)
Invocation for someone you have spoken i.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, to any believer whom I have insulted, let that be cause to draw him near to You on the Day of Resurrection.)
